  The f5distributedcloud_origin_pool resource manages Origin Pools in F5 Distributed Cloud.
  Origin Pools define groups of backend servers that serve application traffic.
  They are used by HTTP Load Balancers to route traffic to appropriate backends.

  resource "f5distributedcloud_origin_pool" "example" {
    name        = "my-origin-pool"
    namespace   = "my-namespace"

    endpoint_protocol = "http"

# f5distributedcloud_origin_pool (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_origin_pool` resource manages Origin Pools in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Origin Pools define groups of backend servers that serve application traffic.
They are used by HTTP Load Balancers to route traffic to appropriate backends.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_origin_pool" "example" {
  name        = "my-origin-pool"
  namespace   = "my-namespace"
  description = "Example Origin Pool"

  port              = 8080
  endpoint_protocol = "http"

  origin_servers {
    public_ip {
      ip = "192.0.2.1"
    }
  }
}
```

## Import

Origin Pools can be imported using namespace/name:

```shell
terraform import f5distributedcloud_origin_pool.example my-namespace/my-origin-pool
```

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Copyright (c) Robin Mordasiewicz
# SPDX-License-Identifier: MPL-2.0

# Example: Origin Pool with Public IP
resource "f5distributedcloud_origin_pool" "public_ip" {
  name        = "public-ip-pool"
  namespace   = "my-namespace"
  description = "Origin pool with public IP servers"

  port              = 8080
  endpoint_protocol = "http"

  origin_servers {
    public_ip {
      ip = "192.0.2.1"
    }
  }

  origin_servers {
    public_ip {
      ip = "192.0.2.2"
    }
  }
}

# Example: Origin Pool with DNS Name
resource "f5distributedcloud_origin_pool" "dns_name" {
  name        = "dns-pool"
  namespace   = "my-namespace"
  description = "Origin pool with DNS-based servers"

  port              = 443
  endpoint_protocol = "https"

  origin_servers {
    public_name {
      dns_name = "api.backend.example.com"
    }
  }
}

# Example: Origin Pool with Private IP on Site
resource "f5distributedcloud_origin_pool" "private_ip" {
  name        = "private-ip-pool"
  namespace   = "my-namespace"
  description = "Origin pool with private servers on site"

  port              = 8080
  endpoint_protocol = "http"

  origin_servers {
    private_ip {
      ip             = "10.0.1.10"
      site_name      = "my-site"
      inside_network = true
    }
  }

  origin_servers {
    private_ip {
      ip             = "10.0.1.11"
      site_name      = "my-site"
      inside_network = true
    }
  }
}

# Example: Origin Pool with Custom Load Balancing
resource "f5distributedcloud_origin_pool" "custom_lb" {
  name        = "custom-lb-pool"
  namespace   = "my-namespace"
  description = "Origin pool with least request load balancing"

  port                     = 8080
  endpoint_protocol        = "http"
  loadbalancer_algorithm   = "LEAST_REQUEST"
  health_check_port        = 8081

  origin_servers {
    public_name {
      dns_name = "server1.backend.example.com"
    }
  }

  origin_servers {
    public_name {
      dns_name = "server2.backend.example.com"
    }
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Origin Pool.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the Origin Pool is created.
- `port` (Number) Port on which origin servers listen.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the Origin Pool.
- `endpoint_protocol` (String) Protocol to use for connecting to origin servers: 'http' or 'https'.
- `health_check_port` (Number) Port for health checks. Defaults to the origin port if not specified.
- `loadbalancer_algorithm` (String) Load balancing algorithm: 'ROUND_ROBIN', 'LEAST_REQUEST', 'RANDOM', 'SOURCE_IP_HASH'.
- `origin_servers` (Block List) List of origin servers in the pool. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--origin_servers))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the Origin Pool.

<a id="nestedblock--origin_servers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `origin_servers`

Optional:

- `labels` (Map of String) Labels for the origin server.
- `private_ip` (Block, Optional) Private IP address of the origin server. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--origin_servers--private_ip))
- `public_ip` (Block, Optional) Public IP address of the origin server. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--origin_servers--public_ip))
- `public_name` (Block, Optional) DNS name of the origin server. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--origin_servers--public_name))

<a id="nestedblock--origin_servers--private_ip"></a>
### Nested Schema for `origin_servers.private_ip`

Required:

- `ip` (String) IPv4 or IPv6 address.
- `site_name` (String) Name of the site where the server is located.

Optional:

- `inside_network` (Boolean) Whether to use inside network.


<a id="nestedblock--origin_servers--public_ip"></a>
### Nested Schema for `origin_servers.public_ip`

Required:

- `ip` (String) IPv4 or IPv6 address.


<a id="nestedblock--origin_servers--public_name"></a>
### Nested Schema for `origin_servers.public_name`

Required:

- `dns_name` (String) Fully qualified domain name.
